title: Ekko being sold at 15000 IP, not 7800
body: Bought Ekko for IP. Although the store tells me he's 7800, and the refund tab tells me that is what I spent, I've gone from just over 18000 IP to 2900. He's charging a lot more than expected, at least for me.

replies.body:
Hey Jatham,

I looked into it and from what I can see we've only recorded one purchase and you still have over 10K IP. Can you re-log in and see if your total IP is correct?
